DataElement.preferredDefinition: A way of denoting the collective genotype of a number of closely linked loci on a chromosome.:Mutually exclusive alternative forms of the same gene occupying the same locus on homologous chromosomes, differing in DNA sequence and governing the same biochemical and developmental process.:A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something._A condition or state at a particular time._Generic value domain for a primitive java datatype that is a Boolean value (true or false).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A way of denoting the collective genotype of a number of closely linked loci on a chromosome.:Mutually exclusive alternative forms of the same gene occupying the same locus on homologous chromosomes, differing in DNA sequence and governing the same biochemical and developmental process.:A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something._A condition or state at a particular time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A way of denoting the collective genotype of a number of closely linked loci on a chromosome.:Mutually exclusive alternative forms of the same gene occupying the same locus on homologous chromosomes, differing in DNA sequence and governing the same biochemical and developmental process.:A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something.

Concepts.definition: A way of denoting the collective genotype of a number of closely linked loci on a chromosome.

Mutually exclusive alternative forms of the same gene occupying the same locus on homologous chromosomes, differing in nucleotide sequence and governing the same biochemical and developmental process.
A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something.

Property.preferredDefinition: A condition or state at a particular time.

Concepts.definition: A condition or state at a particular time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Generic value domain for a primitive java datatype that is a Boolean value (true or false).

ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: 10.14.20 TL changed WFS from DRAFT NEW to RETIRED ARCHIVED and added an End Date in preparation of OneData.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
